name: hn-designsystem
description: NPM pakke og dokumentasjon for Helsenorges designsystem
author: Helsenorge

scripts.release:ensure-clean: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo "Repo has uncommitted changes. Commit or stash first." && exit 1)
scripts.version:patch: npm -w frankenstein-build-tools version patch --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/designsystem-react version patch --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/datepicker version patch --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/lightbox version patch --git-tag-version=false
scripts.version:minor: npm -w frankenstein-build-tools version minor --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/designsystem-react version minor --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/datepicker version minor --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/lightbox version minor --git-tag-version=false
scripts.version:major: npm -w frankenstein-build-tools version major --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/designsystem-react version major --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/datepicker version major --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/lightbox version major --git-tag-version=false
scripts.version:beta: npm -w frankenstein-build-tools version prerelease --preid=beta --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/designsystem-react version prerelease --preid=beta --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/datepicker version prerelease --preid=beta --git-tag-version=false && npm -w @helsenorge/lightbox version prerelease --preid=beta --git-tag-version=false
scripts.release:commit: git add -A && git commit -m "chore(release): v$(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")" && npm run changelog && npm run postchangelog
scripts.postchangelog: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend --no-edit && git tag -f v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
